title: Provisioning Engine Template
description: Defines the configuration to use when applying a template to a site

overwrite.description: Declares whether the Property Bag Entry has to overwrite an already existing entry.

indexed.description: Declares whether the Property Bag Entry has to be indexed.

name.description: the name of the term group to create or update

auditSettings.description: The Audit Settings for the Provisioning Template

auditLogTrimmingRentention.description: The Audit Log Trimming Retention for Audits

trimAuditLog.description: A flag to enable Audit Log Trimming, optional attribute

auditFlags.description: A single Audit setting defined by an AuditFlag

propertyBagEntries.description: The Property Bag entries of the Provisioning Template
The Property Bag entries of the list
